text: Julio César Cleto Cobos (born Mendoza, Argentina, April 30, 1955) is an Argentine politician. He is the Vice President of Argentina for President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner from 2007 to 2011. Profile at Argentine Senate Website , 16 August 2009. He started as part of the Radical Civic Union (UCR). He became Governor of Mendoza in 2003. ==References== Category:Vice presidents of Argentina Category:People from Mendoza Category:1955 births Category:Living people
title: Julio Cobos
